name: Electrom Coin
short_description: Man has done such things due to his many aspirations which is against the nature. He has done a lot of harm by going against the nature of his and upcoming breeds. But now the time has come that no work should be done against nature. He still has a chance to improve and do something good for the world. The urgent demand of at present is to not go against nature and go with it. Even if it is not a field like medicine field, different types of systems are working, but each has its own limitations. One of these systems comes to mind that works on the principles of nature called Electrohomeopathy. This system was invented by Dr. Count Ceaser Mattei, a Nobel man. He recognized the natural energy stored by plants from natural sources like sunlight, rain, thunderstorm, air, earth and water etc. called electro as energy. And understood the importance of homeostasis of the body is maintain by its various organ to make the constant steady state of the blood and lymph is health , vitiation in these is a disease. So, he gave it perfect name “Electrohomeopathy”. No, doubt this system has unbound potential to become future medicine. At present, many incurable diseases are being treated with this system in very successful way. It is necessary that its promotion, dissemination, research and development so that the coming generations can benefit from it. This coin is also an effort in this context which will take it to Height in the coming times and also solve the problems coming in this system. This will be a true tribute to Dr. Mattei..
